name: Sarah Menon
bio: With over 20 years of experience, Sarah brings deep discipline and expressiveness to her teaching. She has performed on global stages.

name: Priya Reddy
bio: Priya is known for her fluid grace and technical perfection. She focuses on the sculpturesque poses of Odissi.

name: David Lin
bio: David bridges the gap between classical rigor and modern fluidity, helping students find their own unique movement language.
